title: Commemorative Textile, 1876
dimensions: Warp: 134 cm (52 3/4in.). Weft: (selvage to selvage) 63cm (24 3/4 in.).
description: Length  of three un-cut-apart American flags with 39 stars made for the 1876 Centennial in Philadelphia. Around the border are the flags of nations that participated in the Centennial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Commemorative Textile, 1876.
1876. Roller-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-300.
